item.title: Can u be free mmber?
item.dc:creator: @Scar Scar
item.description:
@Scar wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized”][/quote][quote=“The Un-Named, post:10, topic:25326”][quote author=typenamehere link=topic=38132.msg468346#msg468346 date=1163722382]

one guy got life-member by being first 2 report a bug :eek:
[/quote]well actually he got life time membership becuase he reported to dupe

It wasn’t. He got perm banned.[/quote]

Incorrect.

While the article may be vague, it verifies RuneKids assertion.

[/quote]
i’ve heard something like when he reported the bug jag staff told him to go check his mailbox , so he logged out and checked his mailbox but it was empty so he decided to log back in and ask the staff why he did not receive an email.when he tried logging in it wouldn’t work cause he was banned.

<===Thats what i heard

Read full topic

item.title: Can u be free mmber?
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:7, topic:25326”]Yeah you can, haven’t you read the news?

“whele scranning teh jahva lunix serva, i fond out dat all’s u gotsta due is send ur pass to insert rediculous email here@hotfemail.com n den u get free memberchips! lolol, u see, da way that this shit n stuff works is that ur pass confuses dat dumbo server or runescrape, lololol. my pah is teh leet hacker n shit so he fouind out dis crap pplz, i swear it not scam”[/quote]
lmao, leave it to jme for the whacked out shit. But no, like everyone else said, you can’t get free memberships unless you have some elderly relative and you scam them of their money.

Read full topic
